Literature.Title: Derivatives of the antimicrobial peptide BP100 for expression in plant systems.
Literature.Author: Badosa E, Moiset G, Montesinos L, Talleda M, Bardají E, Feliu L, Planas M, Montesinos E

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:61% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:66% Hemolysis=150 µM,Human erythrocytes:74% Hemolysis=250 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. Vesicatoria 2133-2(MIC=10-20µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae EPS 94(MIC=7.5-10µM),Erwinia amylovora PMV 6076(MIC=10-20µM)
